Sentencas: Cell preparation techniques and design parameters have significant impacts on the electrochemical performance of direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells (DC-SOFCs).
Titulo: New insights into single-step fabrication of finger-like anode/electrolyte for high-performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells: Experimental and simulation studies

Sentencas: In this work, a finger-like nickel-based anode/electrolyte has been successfully fabricated in a single step via the tape-casting combined phase-inversion and co-sintering technique, which simplified the preparation process and reduced the fabrication cost.
Titulo: New insights into single-step fabrication of finger-like anode/electrolyte for high-performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells: Experimental and simulation studies

Sentencas: The finger-like anode/ electrolyte exhibited identical microstructure and exceptional adhesion, ensuring the absence of any cracks during the co-sintering process.
Titulo: New insights into single-step fabrication of finger-like anode/electrolyte for high-performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells: Experimental and simulation studies

Sentencas: As a result, the corresponding single cell delivered a very competitive output of 436 mW cm-2 at 850 degrees C using activated carbon as fuel.
Titulo: New insights into single-step fabrication of finger-like anode/electrolyte for high-performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells: Experimental and simulation studies

Sentencas: Moreover, it operated stably for 20.1 h under 100 mA with a high fuel utilization of 22.5% at 850 degrees C. Model verification was also performed by comparative analysis of the effects of the finger-like pore length, anode thickness, cathode thickness, and electrolyte thickness on the cell performance using numerical simulation, which generated the resultant two-dimensional distributions of CO molar concentration, current density, O2 molar concentration, and temperature as well as the power output of the cell.
Titulo: New insights into single-step fabrication of finger-like anode/electrolyte for high-performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells: Experimental and simulation studies

Sentencas: Simulation results verified the experimental findings that DC-SOFC performance was enhanced with increases in the finger-like pore length and cathode thickness, and with decreases in the anode and electrolyte thicknesses.
Titulo: New insights into single-step fabrication of finger-like anode/electrolyte for high-performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells: Experimental and simulation studies

Sentencas: This work provides valuable insights into further optimizing the cell design and manufacturing process, paving the way for the development of high-performance DC-SOFCs.
Titulo: New insights into single-step fabrication of finger-like anode/electrolyte for high-performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells: Experimental and simulation studies
